pr_title: Detect noop of update index settings

timeline.message: Detect noop of index setting update

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason we do not want this to be the same? With the block already in place, this could be a no-op?
timeline.author: henningandersen

timeline.bodyText: This sets changed=true regardless of whether block was in place or not. I think we should handle that too - mainly for completeness more than necessity.
timeline.author: henningandersen

replies.bodyText: I was focusing on the optimization for CCR. I've adjusted this in f43c2ea.
